name: Lucky Bee Game - Kids Version
description:
WELCOME TO THE KIDS VERSION OF LUCKY BEE GAME

INSTRUCTIONS (VERY SIMPLE): 

- Click on spin ..."Lucky" (the bee) will  land on the first flower 
- After video ends click on spin again
- There are 7 flowers that get more and more difficult to spell

PLEASE MAKE SURE TO FOLLOW WITH OUR YOUTUBE CHANNEL AS WELL

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCL54AI7cAX8Yw7tsKUc53FA

THANK YOU AND ENJOY !!! 
STEWIE BEE https://luckybeegame.com/
